summary: A command‑line example that launches training and fine‑tuning of an RNNT‑based automatic speech recognition model using NVIDIA NeMo, with configurable datasets, trainer settings, and optimizer parameters via Hydra and PyTorch Lightning.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly set up, customize, and run ASR model training or fine‑tuning pipelines for speech‑to‑text applications.
